page.title: 18Recreation In Newport
page.content: {Sporting Activities.} Swimming,Tennis,Karate,Judo,Bowls, Cycling,Football,Cricket,Badminton, Canoeing,Keep-fit,Gymnastics,Golf. {Clubs and Group Activities.} Sunday School,Red Cross,Choir,Ballet Dancing,Scouts and Guides,Girls Friendly Society,Civic Society,Youth Club,Disco,Winemaking,Jazz Band,Darts, Dominoes,Snooker,Historical Society, Flower Arrainging. {Leisure Activities for One Person.} Fishing,Walking,Jogging,Horse-Riding, B.M.X. Riding,Roller-Skating,Knitting, Sewing,Reading,Computers,Painting, Gardening,Bird-Watching,Music. {Family Recreation.} Picnices,Outings to Places of Interest ,Playing in Parks,Television,Walking Dogs,Caring for Pets,Film and Theatre, Clubs.
